title: Microsoft OneNote: Save Notes
description:
Organize your thoughts, discoveries, and ideas and simplify planning important moments in your life with your digital notepad. Take notes on your phone and sync them across all your devices with Microsoft OneNote.

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

Take notes, share ideas, organize and collaborate with Microsoft OneNote today.

Homepage & Quick Capture Bar
‚Ä¢ Find all notes from your connected accounts in one place to easily create, find, & act on your notes
‚Ä¢ Now with Samsung Notes integration
‚Ä¢ Capture text, voice, ink or images to your notepad with Quick Capture
‚Ä¢ Capture notes in ink. Click the pen button & write down your thoughts

Scan Pictures & Extract Text
‚Ä¢ Notes Scanner: Scan documents, pictures, or files to extract notes
‚Ä¢ Capture images to extract text from documents, files, & more
‚Ä¢ Apply different filters to change colors, add ink, crop images & more

Audio Notes
‚Ä¢ Take accurate voice notes with voice dictation
‚Ä¢ Click the Mic button to begin recording, then click it again to end recording & save the file
‚Ä¢ Dictate notes in 27 languages (note some languages are in preview) & use Auto-Punctutation to automatically format your notes

Capture Content & Get Organized
‚Ä¢ Write notes, draw & clip things from the web to add to your notebook
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote‚Äôs flexible canvas to place content anywhere you want

Take Notes & Achieve More
‚Ä¢ Organize your notes using to-do lists, follow up items, marks for what‚Äôs important & custom labels
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote as a notebook, journal or a notepad

Save Ideas At The Speed of Light
‚Ä¢ OneNote syncs your notes across all devices & lets multiple people work on the content together, at the same time
‚Ä¢ Notepad badge hovers on screen & lets you quickly write your thoughts down any time
‚Ä¢ Sticky notes are helpful for quick memos

Collaborate & Share Notes
‚Ä¢ Take meeting notes, brainstorm projects, & draw attention to important points
‚Ä¢ Take notes & save ideas across your favorite devices, no matter what device your team likes to use
‚Ä¢ Search your notes with a fast & powerful search function

Better Together With Microsoft Office
‚Ä¢ OneNote is part of the Office family & works great with your favorite apps, such as Excel or Word, to help you do more

Write notes, save ideas & keep up with your to-do list with Microsoft OneNote.

You can find answers to frequently asked questions about OneNote for Android at http://aka.ms/OnenoteAndroidFAQ

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Requires Android OS 9.0 or later.
‚Ä¢ A free Microsoft account is required to use OneNote.
‚Ä¢ OneNote opens existing notebooks created in Microsoft OneNote 2010 format or later.
‚Ä¢ To sync your notes to OneDrive for Business, sign in with your organization‚Äôs Office 365 or SharePoint account.

This app is provided either by Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft‚Äôs End User License Agreement (EULA) for Terms of Service for OneNote on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-us&aid=OneNoteForAndroidLicenseTerms.htm. Microsoft‚Äôs privacy statement is available at https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement

Organize your thoughts, discoveries, and ideas and simplify planning important moments in your life with your digital notepad. Take notes on your phone and sync them across all your devices with Microsoft OneNote.

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

Take notes, share ideas, organize and collaborate with Microsoft OneNote today.

Homepage & Quick Capture Bar
‚Ä¢ Find all notes from your connected accounts in one place to easily create, find, & act on your notes
‚Ä¢ Now with Samsung Notes integration
‚Ä¢ Capture text, voice, ink or images to your notepad with Quick Capture
‚Ä¢ Capture notes in ink. Click the pen button & write down your thoughts

Scan Pictures & Extract Text
‚Ä¢ Notes Scanner: Scan documents, pictures, or files to extract notes
‚Ä¢ Capture images to extract text from documents, files, & more
‚Ä¢ Apply different filters to change colors, add ink, crop images & more

Audio Notes
‚Ä¢ Take accurate voice notes with voice dictation
‚Ä¢ Click the Mic button to begin recording, then click it again to end recording & save the file
‚Ä¢ Dictate notes in 27 languages (note some languages are in preview) & use Auto-Punctutation to automatically format your notes

Capture Content & Get Organized
‚Ä¢ Write notes, draw & clip things from the web to add to your notebook
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote‚Äôs flexible canvas to place content anywhere you want

Take Notes & Achieve More
‚Ä¢ Organize your notes using to-do lists, follow up items, marks for what‚Äôs important & custom labels
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote as a notebook, journal or a notepad

‚Ä¢ OneNote syncs your notes across all devices & lets multiple people work on the content together, at the same time
‚Ä¢ Notepad badge hovers on screen & lets you quickly write your thoughts down any time
‚Ä¢ Sticky notes are helpful for quick memos

Collaborate & Share Notes
‚Ä¢ Take meeting notes, brainstorm projects, & draw attention to important points
‚Ä¢ Take notes & save ideas across your favorite devices, no matter what device your team likes to use
‚Ä¢ Search your notes with a fast & powerful search function

Better Together With Microsoft Office
‚Ä¢ OneNote is part of the Office family & works great with your favorite apps, such as Excel or Word, to help you do more

Write notes, save ideas & keep up with your to-do list with Microsoft OneNote.

You can find answers to frequently asked questions about OneNote for Android at http://aka.ms/OnenoteAndroidFAQ

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Requires Android OS 9.0 or later.
‚Ä¢ A free Microsoft account is required to use OneNote.
‚Ä¢ OneNote opens existing notebooks created in Microsoft OneNote 2010 format or later.
‚Ä¢ To sync your notes to OneDrive for Business, sign in with your organization‚Äôs Office 365 or SharePoint account.

This app is provided either by Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft‚Äôs End User License Agreement (EULA) for Terms of Service for OneNote on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-us&aid=OneNoteForAndroidLicenseTerms.htm. Microsoft‚Äôs privacy statement is available at https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement
summary: Powerful notepad to capture ideas & save notes. Easily organize & share notes

title: Smart Notes: AI Summary, Quiz
description:
Smart Notes is the study and productivity app that lets you spend less time reading and more time understanding. Upload a lengthy PDF, class hand-out or business report and Smart Notes pulls out the key ideas, lets you chat with the document in plain language, writes quiz questions that mirror real exams and creates flashcards that keep facts fresh.

Key Features
‚Ä¢ AI Document Summarizer: Convert dense chapters, research papers and white papers into concise, keyword-rich notes in seconds.
‚Ä¢ Document Chat: Ask any question about your uploaded file and get instant answers with cited passages.
‚Ä¢ Quiz Generator: Produce multiple-choice questions at different difficulty levels so you can test comprehension right away.
‚Ä¢ Flashcard Maker: Build spaced-repetition decks automatically and track recall to boost long-term memory.
‚Ä¢ Multi-Format Support: Import PDF, DOC or TXT files directly from local storage.
‚Ä¢ Progress Dashboard: See reading coverage, quiz scores and flashcard streaks in one neat view.
‚Ä¢ Dark Mode and Accessibility: Eye-friendly interface with screen-reader support for comfortable study sessions.

Perfect For
‚Ä¢ High-school and university students who need short lecture notes, realistic practice tests and quick Q&A before exams.
‚Ä¢ Graduate researchers who want to skim journal articles faster, ask targeted questions and build flashcards for literature reviews.
‚Ä¢ Busy professionals who summarise market reports and technical documents minutes before meetings and quiz themselves on the numbers that matter.
‚Ä¢ Language learners who turn reading passages into vocabulary drills, comprehension checks and interactive chat for deeper understanding.
‚Ä¢ Lifelong learners and hobbyists who transform manuals, how-to guides and non-fiction books into engaging study material for continuous self-improvement.

Policies You Should Know
End-User License Agreement: https://smartnotes.miadigital.us/eula
Terms of Service: https://smartnotes.miadigital.us/terms
Privacy Policy: https://smartnotes.miadigital.us/privacy-policy

Accuracy Notice
Content created by Smart Notes is generated by artificial intelligence for educational use only. Always double-check critical facts and figures before relying on them.

Download Smart Notes now and watch your reading list turn into actionable knowledge in minutes.

title: Wave AI Note Taker & Recorder
description:
Transform the way you capture ideas, lectures, and meetings with Wave AI Meeting Note Taker. Wave AI is your smart AI voice notes app that uses Speech to Text to transcribe audio recordings and turn every meeting into clear, structured notes. With a high-quality audio recorder, let voice notes AI transcribe audio instantly and summarize your meeting notes. Using an advanced speech to text engine, the app helps you transcribe conversations accurately. As a reliable AI note taker for daily work, the app ensures your meeting notes follow you wherever you work or study, with powerful integrations like Zoom, Teams, Google Meet, Notion, OneNote, and Evernote. Use the built-in recorder to capture audio recording and transcribe speech to text in real time so you can focus on the conversation, not the keyboard, while your note taker works in the background.

Transcribe Audio Recordings to Text with an AI Recorder

üéô Crystal-Clear Audio Recorder Record every word from lectures, calls, and meetings using a high-quality recorder, then transcribe audio recordings to text with accuracy. ü§ñ Smart AI Note Taker With speech to text technology, this AI note taker captures conversations and transcribes meeting notes in real time. üìù Lecture Note Taker Mode Perfect for students who need a lecture note taker to record lectures and transcribe audio into organized study notes. üìã Meeting Notes in Seconds AI-powered transcription allows you to transcribe meetings quickly and generate clear meeting notes from recorded audio. üîÑ Voice Notes AI Capture ideas with a built-in recorder and transcribe audio into a structured AI notebook. üìÇ Wide App Integrations Sync recorded and transcribed notes with Notion, OneNote, Evernote, Google Docs, and more. üìû Phone Call Recording via VoIP Use the recorder to record calls, transcribe audio, and receive key summaries automatically. üíª Web and Mobile Access Use the recorder and transcription features seamlessly across devices. üìÖ Calendar Integration Link recorded meetings so transcribed notes are easy to retrieve. üåç Multi-Language Support Use the recorder to capture conversations and transcribe audio in multiple languages. With this app, you do not just get voice notes. You get a searchable, shareable, and AI-powered archive of recorded and transcribed audio from your most important conversations. Using the app is simple. Record directly from your phone, web app, or integrated meeting tools with the built-in recorder. Transcribe audio recordings using advanced speech to text technology. Summarize transcribed notes to highlight key insights automatically. Share recorded and transcribed notes instantly. Whether you are capturing meeting notes, recording a lecture, or brainstorming ideas, the recorder captures everything while the app transcribes audio behind the scenes so you can focus on listening. Perfect for Students and Professionals Students use the app as a lecture note taker to turn lectures into study-ready notes. Professionals rely on the recorder to capture meetings and transcribe audio into reliable meeting notes. Journalists, researchers, and content creators use the recorder to transcribe interviews and conversations accurately. From one-on-one interviews to large conference calls, the recorder ensures every conversation can be transcribed, organized, and ready for action. Many apps can record. A few can transcribe. This app combines a powerful recorder with fast transcribe audio technology to deliver structured meeting notes, searchable transcripts, and seamless integrations in one place. Stop juggling multiple tools. Use the recorder to capture audio and transcribe conversations instantly. Download now and experience effortless audio recording and transcription.

title: Studocu: AI Notes & Summaries
description:
Record your classes and get instant AI notes. Studocu‚Äôs lecture recorder captures every word, generates transcripts and summaries in seconds, and turns classes into quizzes and organized study notes. Use Studocu as your all-in-one summary AI note taker and lecture recorder.

New: Class Recording
- Record lectures, seminars, and study groups in the app
- Full transcripts for accurate note taking
- AI summaries that highlight key points
- One-tap study tools: quizzes and organized study notes



Why students choose Studocu
- Lecture note taker and recorder designed for classes
- AI notes and summaries that save time
- Core AI note taking tools available at no cost
- Personalized study lists to keep materials organized
- Built for college and high school coursework across subjects



More tools to boost your grades
- Ask AI Anything for step-by-step explanations in math, science, and languages
- AI Camera Solver: take a photo of a problem and get clear guidance
- AI Quiz Maker: turn any transcript or notes into practice questions
- Massive study library with notes, guides, and practice exams
- Homework helper with trusted answers from AI and fellow students



How it helps you study smarter
- Capture lectures, transcribe, and summarize for stress-free note taking
- Turn lessons into quizzes to test yourself
- Organize transcripts, notes, and quizzes by course
- Search across your notes, transcripts, and summaries


Built for student life
- Fast setup before class starts
- Works for large lecture halls and small study groups
- Reliable for in-person and online classes


From quick homework help to advanced lecture recording, Studocu is the AI note taker for students who want to study smarter, not harder.

Download now and transform lectures into notes, summaries, and quizzes.

Support and info
 Customer Support: https://www.studocu.com/en/support
 Privacy Policy: https://www.studocu.com/en/privacy-policy
 Terms of Use: https://www.studocu.com/en/terms

title: AI Note Taker - Voice to Notes
description:
Focus on the conversation, not on taking notes. Our app uses GPT-4 AI to automatically capture and summarize your meetings, lectures, and more.

Effortless Summaries: Condense long notes and even YouTube videos in seconds.
Simplified Text: Understand complex topics with ease.
Capture it All: Record and transcribe your important conversations.

Effortless Summaries: Condense long notes and even YouTube videos in seconds.
Simplified Text: Understand complex topics with ease.

summary: This AI-powered app captures and summarizes your meetings & lectures.

title: Notebook AI
description:
Transform Any Content Into Smart Notes with AI

Notebook AI turns your videos, audio files, PDFs and YouTube links into organized, structured notes instantly. Now with intelligent chat feature to interact with your notes!

WHY CHOOSE NOTEBOOK AI

Multi-Source Note Creation
Upload or paste content from YouTube videos, audio recordings, video files, and PDF documents. Our AI processes any format and creates comprehensive notes automatically.

Chat With Your Notes
Ask questions about your notes and get instant answers. Search for specific information, request summaries, or explore topics deeper through natural conversation with AI.

Smart Organization
Create custom folders to organize notes by subject, project, or topic. Easily search, filter, and manage all your content in one place.

Multi-Language Support
Process content in multiple languages and generate notes in your preferred language. Perfect for international students and global professionals.

Privacy First
Your uploaded files are processed instantly and deleted immediately after note generation. We never store your original content permanently.

PERFECT FOR STUDENTS

Transform lecture recordings into study-ready notes. Convert educational YouTube videos into structured learning materials. Process research papers and academic PDFs into digestible summaries. Chat with your study notes to prepare for exams.

IDEAL FOR PROFESSIONALS

Turn meeting recordings into actionable summaries. Convert training videos and webinars into reference documents. Process business reports and whitepapers into key insights. Ask questions about your work notes instantly.

GREAT FOR RESEARCHERS

Convert interview recordings into organized transcripts. Process conference presentations and talks into research notes. Analyze academic papers and studies efficiently. Chat with your research to find connections.

USEFUL FOR CONTENT CREATORS

Research competitor videos and transform them into content ideas. Turn podcasts and industry talks into actionable insights. Process multiple sources into comprehensive research notes. Query your content library for quick reference.

HOW IT WORKS

Simply upload your file or paste a YouTube link. Our advanced AI analyzes the content and generates structured, well-organized notes within seconds. Save notes to custom folders, edit as needed, and chat with them anytime for deeper insights.

KEY CAPABILITIES

Unlimited note generation from multiple sources. Instant AI processing with high accuracy. Interactive chat feature for all your notes. Custom folder system for perfect organization. Full note editing and customization. Fast processing speed for long content. Clean and intuitive user interface. Works offline for saved notes. Regular feature updates and improvements.

SIMPLE THREE STEP PROCESS

Upload your file or paste a YouTube link. AI instantly creates structured notes with key points. Save, organize, chat, and edit your notes anytime.

Download Notebook AI today and experience the future of intelligent note-taking. Turn information overload into organized, searchable knowledge you can chat with.

title: Turbo AI - Notetaker
description:
Turbolearn AI is now Turbo AI! We've rebranded and upgraded our AI-powered platform to transform audio, video, and text into exceptional study materials‚Äîgenerating high-quality notes, quizzes, flashcards, and podcasts instantly.

Turbo's advanced AI creates engaging notes featuring tables, emojis, diagrams, and equations, all synced seamlessly across our app and website (http://www.turbo.ai). Enhance your learning experience by chatting directly with your notes to extract deeper insights.

Students and professionals alike use Turbo AI for lecture notes, meeting summaries, journaling, and more.

Key Features:
- Rich Notes: Beautifully formatted notes with diagrams, equations, tables, and emojis.
- Quiz Questions: Instantly create amazing quiz questions from your notes.
- Flashcards: Effortlessly generate effective flashcards for quick review.
- Podcasts: Turn lengthy content into engaging, easy-to-follow podcasts.
- Folders: Easily organize notes into customizable folders for better management.
- Real-Time Sync: Sync notes across devices with instant updates.

Turbo AI is the better alternative to Coconote, Wave AI, Mindgrasp, and Study Fetch. 

Questions or ideas? Reach out to us at contact@turbolearn.ai :)

Terms of Service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

title: HiNoter - AI Note Taker
description:
HiNoter helps you capture every idea ‚Äî automatically recording, transcribing, and summarizing meetings, lectures, and interviews so you can stay focused on what truly matters.
With one tap, HiNoter records crystal-clear audio, generates accurate transcripts with speaker labels, and creates concise summaries and AI-powered mind maps. Ask questions like ‚ÄúWhat were the main takeaways from today‚Äôs team meeting?‚Äù and get instant, intelligent answers.

Why HiNoter?
‚óèStay focused ‚Äî Be present in the moment while HiNoter takes perfect notes for you.
‚óèSave hours¬†‚Äî Get AI-generated summaries and mind maps that help you see the big picture instantly.
‚óèSearch smarter¬†‚Äî Type a keyword to jump straight to that moment in your audio.
‚óèCollaborate easily¬†‚Äî Share recordings and notes with your team whenever you want.
‚óèYour data, your control¬†‚Äî HiNoter protects your recordings with enterprise-grade security, and sharing is always your choice.

Who Uses HiNoter?
‚óèProfessionals:¬†Capture meetings, action items, and client discussions.
‚óèStudents:¬†Record and review lectures and study sessions.
‚óèResearchers & Journalists:¬†Transcribe and organize interviews.
‚óèEveryone:¬†From brainstorming to voice memos, HiNoter handles it all.

Key Features
‚óèOne-tap recording and AI transcription
‚óèHiNoter automatically joins your calendar meetings to record and summarize
‚óèUpload audio files or YouTube links for instant transcription
‚óèSpeaker identification with high accuracy
‚óèAI-generated summaries and mind maps
‚óèAsk AI anything about your recordings
‚óèAll your recordings and notes are securely encrypted

Subscription Plans:
Description:‚Ä®This is a continuous subscription service (Weekly / Yearly). During the subscription period, users can access all features of the app without limitation.
Payment:‚Ä®Once the purchase is confirmed, the corresponding fee will be charged from the user's iTunes account.
Auto-Renewal:‚Ä®24 hours before the current subscription period ends, Apple will automatically charge the corresponding fee from your iTunes account to renew the plan (weekly or yearly). Once the renewal is successful, your membership will be extended for the next billing cycle.
Cancellation:‚Ä®To avoid being charged for the next cycle, please cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the current period expires. After cancellation, no further charges will be made.

Terms of Service: https://recorder.nieruo.com/agreement/terms-of-service.html
Privacy Policy: https://recorder.nieruo.com/agreement/privacy-policy.html

title: AI Notes
description:
Your AI-powered productivity powerhouse: Introducing "AI Notes"

Capture and store notes effortlessly: Take notes anytime, anywhere, even without an internet connection. Your ideas are safe and accessible offline with "AI Notes."
Unleash the power of AI summarization: Get the gist of your notes instantly. Our advanced AI technology condenses key points and insights, saving you valuable time and mental effort.
Break down language barriers with seamless translation: Communicate effectively across cultures and languages. Translate your notes into over 100 languages with remarkable accuracy, powered by cutting-edge AI translation engines.
Engage with your own personal AI helper: Ask questions, clarify concepts, or simply have a thought-provoking conversation. Our interactive AI bot is always there to learn, assist, and stimulate your thinking.
Organize your notes with ease: Keep your knowledge base well-structured and accessible.
Customize your experience: Make "AI Notes" feel like your own.
Always secure and private: Rest assured that your notes are protected with robust security measures. We prioritize your privacy and ensure your data remains confidential.
Beyond the basics:

Unlock additional AI features: As your needs evolve, explore premium features like advanced AI-powered writing assistance, personalized recommendations, and integration with other productivity tools.
Join the thriving community: Connect with fellow "AI Notes" users, share best practices, and discover new ways to harness the app's capabilities.
Stay up-to-date with constant innovation: We're committed to continuous improvement and regularly release new features and updates to enhance your experience.

Stay up-to-date with constant innovation: We're committed to continuous improvement and regularly release new features and updates to enhance your experience.
summary: Take notes offline, summarize & translate with AI, ask your virtual assistant.

title: Smart Notes: Notepad & Tasks
description: Smart Notes is a clean, powerful and modern notes app designed for fast writing, organizing and securing your ideas. Create notes, add images, make checklists, draw sketches, lock private notes and organize everything with custom folders. Perfect for daily tasks, study notes, personal reminders and work planning. ‚≠ê FEATURES üìù Fast & Simple Note Writing ‚Ä¢ Write unlimited notes smoothly ‚Ä¢ Format text with bold, italic, underline, headings & alignment ‚Ä¢ Create to-do lists, checklists and bullet-style notes ‚Ä¢ Pin important notes at the top üñºÔ∏è Add Images Inside Notes ‚Ä¢ Insert photos inside any note ‚Ä¢ Useful for study, work, travel, receipts & reminders ‚úèÔ∏è Drawing Pad (Handwriting Notes) ‚Ä¢ Draw, sketch or doodle directly inside notes ‚Ä¢ Perfect for diagrams, creative ideas and handwritten planning üîí Secure Your Notes ‚Ä¢ Lock any note with PIN/password ‚Ä¢ Keep private notes safe and hidden ‚Ä¢ Deleted notes move to Trash for recovery üìÇ Organize With Custom Folders ‚Ä¢ Create custom folders for different categories ‚Ä¢ Organize notes by Work, Personal, Study, Ideas & more ‚Ä¢ Smooth left-to-right swipe navigation üåô Light & Dark Mode ‚Ä¢ Switch between Light and Dark themes ‚Ä¢ Clean, minimal and easy-to-read design üöÄ WHY SMART NOTES? ‚Ä¢ Fast, lightweight and simple ‚Ä¢ Professional and clean UI ‚Ä¢ Works offline ‚Ä¢ Ideal for students, professionals, writers & daily users ‚Ä¢ Strong privacy with secure locking üß† PERFECT FOR ‚Ä¢ Study notes ‚Ä¢ Work notes ‚Ä¢ To-do lists & checklists ‚Ä¢ Personal diary & planning ‚Ä¢ Ideas & reminders ‚Ä¢ Drawings, sketches & handwritten notes
descriptionHTML:
Smart Notes is a clean, powerful and modern notes app designed for fast writing, organizing and securing your ideas. Create notes, add images, make checklists, draw sketches, lock private notes and organize everything with custom folders. Perfect for daily tasks, study notes, personal reminders and work planning.

‚≠ê FEATURES

üìù Fast & Simple Note Writing
‚Ä¢ Write unlimited notes smoothly
‚Ä¢ Format text with bold, italic, underline, headings & alignment
‚Ä¢ Create to-do lists, checklists and bullet-style notes
‚Ä¢ Pin important notes at the top

üñºÔ∏è Add Images Inside Notes
‚Ä¢ Insert photos inside any note
‚Ä¢ Useful for study, work, travel, receipts & reminders

‚úèÔ∏è Drawing Pad (Handwriting Notes)
‚Ä¢ Draw, sketch or doodle directly inside notes
‚Ä¢ Perfect for diagrams, creative ideas and handwritten planning

üîí Secure Your Notes
‚Ä¢ Lock any note with PIN/password
‚Ä¢ Keep private notes safe and hidden
‚Ä¢ Deleted notes move to Trash for recovery

üìÇ Organize With Custom Folders
‚Ä¢ Create custom folders for different categories
‚Ä¢ Organize notes by Work, Personal, Study, Ideas & more
‚Ä¢ Smooth left-to-right swipe navigation

üåô Light & Dark Mode
‚Ä¢ Switch between Light and Dark themes
‚Ä¢ Clean, minimal and easy-to-read design

üöÄ WHY SMART NOTES?
‚Ä¢ Fast, lightweight and simple
‚Ä¢ Professional and clean UI
‚Ä¢ Works offline
‚Ä¢ Ideal for students, professionals, writers & daily users
‚Ä¢ Strong privacy with secure locking

üß† PERFECT FOR
‚Ä¢ Study notes
‚Ä¢ Work notes
‚Ä¢ To-do lists & checklists
‚Ä¢ Personal diary & planning
‚Ä¢ Ideas & reminders
‚Ä¢ Drawings, sketches & handwritten notes
summary: Fast notes, checklists, folders, images, drawing & lock. Stay organized easily.

title: Smart Notes - in a new way
description: In Smart Notes, you can use generative AI technologies, create notes with your own categories, personalized links, change text size, color and alignment, make text italic, bold, underline and strikethrough, attach photos, apps and tables. You can scan QR codes without leaving the application. You also have access to unique settings that have been made to create maximum comfort in using the application. And all that in one App!
descriptionHTML: In Smart Notes, you can use generative AI technologies, create notes with your own categories, personalized links, change text size, color and alignment, make text italic, bold, underline and strikethrough, attach photos, apps and tables. You can scan QR codes without leaving the application. You also have access to unique settings that have been made to create maximum comfort in using the application. And all that in one App!
summary: Smart Notes is an application that provides the unique features and experience

title: Smart Notes
description:
üìù Smart Notes ‚Äì Your Complete Note-Taking Solution
Smart Notes helps you capture ideas, organize tasks, and manage your daily activities with powerful note-taking tools, drawing features, reminders, and secure offline storage. Designed for students, professionals, artists, and anyone who wants a simple and reliable way to stay organized.

‚ú® KEY FEATURES
üé® Advanced Drawing Tools

‚Ä¢ Freehand drawing with smooth strokes
‚Ä¢ Add shapes: Circle, Rectangle, Triangle, Star, Heart, Pentagon, Hexagon, Crescent, Semicircle
‚Ä¢ 3D shapes: Sphere, Cube, Cuboid, Cone, Cylinder, Pyramid, Prism, Tetrahedron
‚Ä¢ Professional tools: Lines, Arrows, Eraser
‚Ä¢ Add drawings directly to notes
‚Ä¢ Save drawings to the gallery
‚Ä¢ Resize and edit drawing elements

üìù Rich Text Editing

‚Ä¢ Clean, intuitive editor with Quill-based formatting
‚Ä¢ Add images to your notes
‚Ä¢ Word count, character count, reading time
‚Ä¢ Customizable colors and backgrounds
‚Ä¢ Optional writing guidelines

üîî Smart Reminders

‚Ä¢ Schedule reminders for important tasks
‚Ä¢ Priority options: Low, Medium, High
‚Ä¢ Recurring reminders: Daily, Weekly, Monthly
‚Ä¢ Works offline
‚Ä¢ Tracks overdue tasks

üîí Secure and Private

‚Ä¢ Lock individual notes using fingerprint or face authentication
‚Ä¢ Encrypted backup with password protection
‚Ä¢ Offline-first design: all data stays on your device
‚Ä¢ No tracking and no data collection

üíæ Backup & Restore

‚Ä¢ Full encrypted backup of notes, drawings, and reminders
‚Ä¢ Password-protected backup files
‚Ä¢ Easy restore process
‚Ä¢ Export and share notes anytime

üóÇÔ∏è Organize Your Notes

‚Ä¢ Built-in categories like Work, Personal, Ideas, Meeting, Project, Journal, To-Do, Draft, Important
‚Ä¢ Custom tags for advanced filtering
‚Ä¢ Pin important notes
‚Ä¢ Archive old notes
‚Ä¢ Trash recovery for up to 30 days
‚Ä¢ List and Grid view options

üîç Enhanced Search

‚Ä¢ Search by title, content, or tags
‚Ä¢ Filter by images, drawings, locked notes, or pinned notes
‚Ä¢ Sort by date, title, word count, or reading time
‚Ä¢ Date range filtering
‚Ä¢ Real-time search results

üè† Home Screen Widgets

‚Ä¢ Pin important notes to your home screen
‚Ä¢ Quick access to frequently used notes
‚Ä¢ Clean and simple widget design

üåç Multilingual Support

‚Ä¢ Full English and Arabic support
‚Ä¢ RTL (Right-to-Left) layout
‚Ä¢ Quick language switching

üìä Note Statistics

‚Ä¢ Characters, words, lines, paragraphs
‚Ä¢ Estimated reading time
‚Ä¢ Created and last modified times

üé® Customization Options

‚Ä¢ Material color palettes
‚Ä¢ Custom color picker
‚Ä¢ Adjustable font size
‚Ä¢ Light and dark themes
‚Ä¢ List/Grid layout toggle

üíØ Offline Functionality

‚Ä¢ Works completely offline
‚Ä¢ No subscriptions
‚Ä¢ No cloud sync required
‚Ä¢ All data stays securely stored on your device

üéØ Perfect For

‚Ä¢ Students taking lecture notes
‚Ä¢ Professionals organizing projects and meetings
‚Ä¢ Artists creating sketches and concepts
‚Ä¢ Writers planning ideas and drafts
‚Ä¢ Anyone who needs organized, secure, reliable notes

üîê Privacy First

Smart Notes stores your data locally and gives you complete control. No cloud storage, no analytics, and no external data access.

title: Summary - AI Note Taker
description:
Summary AI makes meetings more productive by automatically recording, transcribing, and summarizing conversations. Whether it‚Äôs a business meeting, interview, classroom lecture, or podcast, Summary AI captures everything clearly so you can stay present and focus.

With one tap, the app records audio, generates accurate transcripts with speaker labels, and creates easy-to-read summaries. You can even ask questions like, ‚ÄúWhat were the key action items from the marketing strategy session?‚Äù and get instant answers, thanks to built-in AI.

Why Use Summary AI?

Take and share professional meeting notes effortlessly

Record and transcribe interviews, lectures, webinars, and podcasts

Generate captions for people with hearing impairments or quiet audio environments

Who Uses Summary AI?

Professionals: Capture meeting notes, action items, and client discussions

Students: Record and review lectures, study groups, and seminars

Journalists & Researchers: Transcribe interviews with precision

Everyone: From voice memos to webinars, it handles it all

Key Features

One-Tap Recording
Start recording instantly and stay focused. Summary AI takes care of the rest.

Unlimited Recording Time
Record as much as you need, no time limits, no interruptions.

Records in the Background or with Screen Locked
Keep recording while your phone is locked or you're using other apps. Perfect for discreet, uninterrupted sessions.

Accurate Transcription with Speaker Labels
Transcripts that make sense, clearly labeled, searchable, and easy to review.

AI-Powered Summaries & Key Points
Don‚Äôt just get a transcript, get the big picture with bullet-pointed summaries.

Smart Search & Timestamp Jumping
Type a keyword, jump straight to that moment in the recording.

Ask Questions About the Conversation
Get instant answers from the AI like ‚ÄúWho was assigned the budget review?‚Äù

Automatic Punctuation, Capitalization & Line Breaks
Clean, easy-to-read transcripts without any manual formatting.

Boost Your Productivity

Save time reviewing meetings, just skim the summary

Stay present in conversations, not distracted by note-taking

Export notes to PDF, share with teams, or save for personal reference

Never lose a detail, everything is searchable

Your recordings and notes are private, always. Summary AI prioritizes security, and your data is never shared with third parties.

Summary AI makes meetings more productive by automatically recording, transcribing, and summarizing conversations. Whether it‚Äôs a business meeting, interview, classroom lecture, or podcast, Summary AI captures everything clearly so you can stay present and focus.

With one tap, the app records audio, generates accurate transcripts with speaker labels, and creates easy-to-read summaries. You can even ask questions like, ‚ÄúWhat were the key action items from the marketing strategy session?‚Äù and get instant answers, thanks to built-in AI.

title: Notewise - AI Notes, PDF, Docs
description: üèÜ Google Play‚Äôs Best of 2024 Winner Notewise is the future of note-taking on Android. Whether you‚Äôre sketching diagrams, annotating PDFs, journaling ideas, or building a second brain‚ÄîNotewise gives you a freeform canvas that feels like pen and paper‚Äîsupercharged by AI. With Notewise, you don‚Äôt just take notes. You create good notes ‚Äîsearchable, flexible, and future-proof. ‚ú® AI Superpowers for Your Notes Notewise AI makes your notes smarter‚Äîwithout compromising your privacy. ‚Ä¢ Chat with your notes: ask questions, summarize content, or review key ideas. ‚Ä¢ Auto-generate guided podcasts from your writing. ‚Ä¢ Highlight anywhere‚Äîtyped or handwritten‚Äîand ask context-aware questions. ‚Ä¢ OCR handwriting, scanned documents, and images in 20+ languages. ‚Ä¢ Make messy scribbles searchable‚Äîinstantly. üö´ No data selling. üö´ No creepy analytics. üñäÔ∏è Handwriting That Feels Like Magic Designed for stylus-first note-takers, Notewise offers: ‚Ä¢ Ultra-low-latency writing ‚Ä¢ Reliable palm rejection ‚Ä¢ Pressure-sensitive pens and smooth highlighters ‚Ä¢ Realistic stroke stabilization and smart shape assist Whether you're taking class notes or sketching wireframes, it just works. üõ†Ô∏è Tools Built for Power Users Use the full toolbox to create your own system of thinking and learning: Pen, Highlighter, Eraser, Lasso, Tape, Shape, Textbox, Image, Audio Recorder, Table, Zoombox, Ruler, Laser Pointer. Create freely. Every tool is fast, fluid, and purpose-built. üîç AI OCR: Your Handwriting, Now Searchable ‚Ä¢ Extract text from handwritten notes, scans, or imported PDFs ‚Ä¢ Find formulas, quotes, or action items in seconds ‚Ä¢ Multilingual support for global users ‚Ä¢ Works across class notes, whiteboards, worksheets, and more üìÇ Organize with Confidence ‚Ä¢ Unlimited folders, tags, and sorting options ‚Ä¢ Pin recent notes, merge content, reorder pages ‚Ä¢ Bulk import/export with smart file handling ‚Ä¢ Color-code and customize your library ü§ù Sync, Collaborate, Share ‚Ä¢ Real-time collaboration in shared notebooks ‚Ä¢ Seamless sync across Android, iOS, and Web ‚Ä¢ Offline-first with automatic cloud sync ‚Ä¢ Share via URL, QR code, or export to PDF/image formats üîí Privacy-First by Design We‚Äôre a small, independent team. We don‚Äôt sell your data. We don‚Äôt show ads. Your notes are encrypted, secure, and under your control. ‚Ä¢ Choose one-time purchase or subscription ‚Ä¢ Notewise Cloud unlocks sync, AI, OCR, and collaboration ‚Ä¢ Use core features for free‚Äîforever No paywall for basics. No lock-in. üöÄ Always Getting Better We ship fast: 20+ major updates in the last year. Recent additions include: ‚Ä¢ Redesigned UI with adaptive layout ‚Ä¢ Tape tool to hide and reveal content ‚Ä¢ Tabbed navigation, note linking, shape editing ‚Ä¢ Table support, image tools, audio export ‚Ä¢ Recycle bin, page rotation, and more And we're just getting started. ‚úçÔ∏è Take Good Notes Only Notewise is built for thinkers, tinkerers, students, and builders of all kinds. Whether you‚Äôre diagramming an idea, revising a lecture, or designing your own productivity system‚ÄîNotewise adapts to how you think. ‚Äî Skip the bloat. Keep the power. Build your notes your way‚Äîwith a tool that respects your privacy. üì• Download Notewise for free today and experience note-taking that works like code: fast, indexable, and smart.

Notewise is the future of note-taking on Android. Whether you‚Äôre sketching diagrams, annotating PDFs, journaling ideas, or building a second brain‚ÄîNotewise gives you a freeform canvas that feels like pen and paper‚Äîsupercharged by AI.

title: AI Note Taker ‚Äì Smart Notes
description:
AI Note Taker: The Smarter Way to Capture Ideas

Turn audio, video, YouTube, podcasts, and text into instant AI-powered notes. 

You‚Äôre in class, at a meeting, or studying from videos, AI Note Taker 
automatically records, transcribes, and summarizes everything so you never miss a detail.

Key Features
- Voice & Audio Notes: Record conversations, lectures, and meetings with instant AI transcripts.  
- Video & YouTube Notes: Import videos or links and get clear, structured summaries.  
- Podcast & File Support: Upload MP3s, PDFs, or documents and generate smart notes.  
- AI Summaries & Action Points: Get highlights, tasks, and key takeaways in seconds.  
- Search & Ask Your Notes: Interact with your notes to extract insights instantly.  
- Multi-Language Support: Works with 50+ languages for global learning and work.  
- Export & Share: Save notes as PDF, text, or share them with classmates and colleagues.

Perfect For
- Students & Lecturers: A powerful lecture note taker that creates study guides and flashcards.  
- Professionals: Smart meeting note taker that captures action items and follow-ups.  
- Content Creators: Summarize YouTube videos, podcasts, and interviews in seconds.  
- Everyone: Keep organized notes, synced across devices, searchable, and secure.

Why Consider AI Note Taker?
- Most searched keywords covered: AI note taker, note taking, lecture note taker, voice note taker  
- Accurate AI transcription & summarization  
- Easy to use with multiple input sources  
- Private & secure storage of your notes

Stop writing notes manually, let AI work for you. 
Download AI Note Taker today and experience the future of smart note taking.
